channel.title: $250 - I want a Webcam, Wireless Mouse & Keyboard, and (possibly) a Monitor
channel.description:
So I got a $250 Walmart gift card for some work I did over the summer, and I finally decided that I am going to spend it revamping the PC in my room. Yes, [url=http://walmart.com]Walmart[/url] only.
I will show you what I have come up with, but if you find better ones on there I would love to see them. [b] Webcam: http://www.walmart.com/catalog/product.do?product_id=12575363 (Definite)[/b] Mouse & Keyboard http://www.walmart.com/ip/Logitech-Cordless-Desktop-Keyboard-and-Mouse-EX100-Combo/10975663 (simplistic and cheap) http://www.walmart.com/ip/Microsoft-Wireless-Laser-Desktop-Keyboard-and-Mouse-Combo-6000-v3/10929739 (ergonomic and fancy, more expensive)
The monitor really depends on how expensive the other two items are, but here is what I've found that are in the approximate price range: http://www.walmart.com/ip/HP-HP-2010I/14903828 http://www.walmart.com/ip/AOC-919VWA/11060705 http://www.walmart.com/ip/Acer-V173DJB/14575812 http://www.walmart.com/ip/Acer-V193WEJB/14575816
Suggestions please!

@cumescape wrote:

item.title: $250 - I want a Webcam, Wireless Mouse & Keyboard, and (possibly) a Monitor
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

The two items I bought (combo + cam) arrived in under 48 hours using the free shipping method. Thank goodness I didn’t choose one of the ‘faster’ options

Mouse was acting weird at first, but it was just a setting that I could change in Control Panel.

Keyboard works great. Going to install webcam software now.

Read full topic

item.title: $250 - I want a Webcam, Wireless Mouse & Keyboard, and (possibly) a Monitor
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“la­wl, post:20, topic:372140”][quote author=listenir link=topic=468193.msg3424780#msg3424780 date=1291834042]

Ok, so the webcam has been chosen.
Can I get a vote on which keyboard to get?

EDIT - Webcam and the simple wireless keyboard/mouse have been purchased.

Now I just need a monitor and (maybe) a headset.

Card balance: $159.31

Why do you even want a webcam? It’s not like you’ll need it. I mean who the fuck would want to go on webcam with this;

http://sphotos.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-snc4/hs801.snc4/68172_1716845368147_1448610557_1829691_8152612_n.jpg

Buy an epic monitor, look at something beatiful!
[/quote]
shutup idiet

ps should have bought a gaming keyboard[/quote]That’s what I was thinking, but multiple people kept telling me ‘just go simplistic’

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“la­wl, post:10, topic:372140”][quote author=abatssk8ter link=topic=468193.msg3423210#msg3423210 date=1291683069]

Is there a specific reason you can’t order from newegg.com? Because it will certainly give you many more and cheaper choices.
[/quote]It’s a walmart giftcard… lol

and david, i recommend the first HP monitor, then go ahead and buy that nice keyboard and mouse.

as for the webcam, do you really need a 50$ webcam?! for what? its just a webcam not a digital camera.

tbh that webcam looks amazing. i think its worth it, $50 isnt that much and cheaper webcams make awful video[/quote]Ok, cool. That’s what I was thinking.

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:8, topic:372140”]Is there a specific reason you can’t order from newegg.com? Because it will certainly give you many more and cheaper choices.[/quote]Yes
“So I got a $250 Walmart gift card for some work I did over the summer, and I finally decided that I am going to spend it revamping the PC in my room. Yes, Walmart only.”
